title: vGuard
description: A comprehensive, AI-powered smart agriculture platform that revolutionizes modern farming through cutting-edge technology. Combining artificial intelligence, IoT sensors, real-time marketplace connectivity, and intelligent automation to maximize crop yields and connect farmers directly with wholesale buyers.

longDescription.intro: vGuard is a comprehensive, AI-powered smart agriculture platform designed to revolutionize modern farming through cutting-edge technology. By combining artificial intelligence, Internet of Things (IoT) sensors, real-time marketplace connectivity, and intelligent automation, vGuard empowers farmers with data-driven insights to maximize crop yields, prevent disease outbreaks, and connect directly with wholesale buyers. Built on a robust full-stack architecture with enterprise-grade security and scalability, vGuard serves as a complete farm management ecosystem accessible through web and mobile platforms.
features: Three-Tier AI Disease Detection: Custom CNN + Google Gemini AI for 85-95% accuracy, instant diagnosis in under 5 seconds, supports 20+ paddy diseases with comprehensive treatment recommendations
AI-Powered Agricultural Chatbot: 24/7 intelligent assistant powered by Google Gemini AI, context-aware responses, multilingual support (English, Sinhala, Tamil)
Comprehensive IoT Device Management: 12+ device types including weather stations, soil sensors, NPK sensors, real-time monitoring with interactive dashboards, 1-year data retention
Advanced Alert System: 5 alert types (Threshold, Trend Analysis, Combination, Predictive, Device Health), machine learning-based forecasting 24-48 hours in advance
Integrated Wholesale Marketplace: Direct farmer-to-buyer platform eliminating middlemen (30% cost savings), real-time chat and negotiation tools, bulk order management
Smart Treatment Calendar: AI-generated medication schedules, automated reminders, progress tracking, weather integration for optimal application timing
Multilingual Platform: Complete translation in English, Sinhala, Tamil with cultural localization and persistent language preferences
Cross-Platform Access: Responsive web app + native Android app (iOS planned), PWA with offline functionality, touch-optimized interface
tools: Disease Scanner: Three scanning tiers (Simple, Enhanced, Standard) with instant AI analysis, 50+ medicine recommendations with local pricing (LKR), treatment plans with step-by-step instructions
IoT Dashboard: Live sensor monitoring, historical data visualization with time range selectors, device health tracking, location mapping for field devices
Marketplace Tools: Create crop listings with multiple images, buyer request system with matching algorithm, real-time messaging and negotiation, transaction history and analytics
Admin Dashboard: User management with role-based access control, content management system for diseases/tips/experts, weather alert broadcasting, comprehensive analytics and reporting
Knowledge Base: Searchable disease database (50+ diseases), farmer tips library with best practices, expert consultation platform with Q&A
Treatment Management: Automated calendar generation from disease detection, customizable medication plans, photo documentation of progress, completion statistics

title: Medusa 2.0
description: A production-ready Capture The Flag (CTF) platform featuring military-grade security controls, intuitive team registration, secure payment verification, and real-time flag submission with comprehensive tracking and analytics.

longDescription.intro: Medusa 2.0 is a modern, security-first CTF competition platform designed specifically for inter-university cybersecurity events. Built with React and Node.js, it combines sleek cyberpunk aesthetics with enterprise-grade security features to deliver a seamless experience for both organizers and competitors.
features: Security-First Architecture: Multi-layer XSS and SQL injection prevention, rate limiting, secure file uploads
Multi-Step Registration: Team info, member management, payment verification with progress persistence
Real-Time Flag Submission: Instant validation, duplicate prevention, status tracking
Modern UX: Cyberpunk theme with neon gradients, fully responsive, accessibility compliant
Comprehensive Security: Input sanitization, server-side validation, hardened API headers
Production Tested: 150+ teams supported, zero breaches, 90%+ uptime
tools: Team Registration: Guided multi-step form with inline validation and local persistence
Payment/Proof Upload: Secure file handling with MIME validation and verification workflow
Event Timeline: Interactive timeline of registration, qualifiers, and finals
Flag Submission System: Real-time validation with comprehensive audit logging
Admin Dashboard: Backend routes and models for team management and verification
Security Controls: Rate limiting, audit logging, IP tracking, and abuse prevention

title: Plastic Molds Admin Dashboard
description: A cutting-edge business intelligence platform designed specifically for plastic mold manufacturers and distributors. Combines real-time analytics, competitive intelligence, and AI-driven insights to help businesses make data-driven decisions and stay ahead in the competitive plastic manufacturing industry.

longDescription.intro: A comprehensive Admin Dashboard built exclusively for plastic mold manufacturers and distributors. This powerful web application combines real-time analytics, competitive intelligence, and AI-driven insights with a beautiful glassmorphism design. Built with React 18.3+ and modern web technologies, it delivers lightning-fast performance with enterprise-grade security and scalability.
features: Real-Time Dashboard: Live metrics for website visitors, active inventory, competitor scores, and sales performance with interactive data visualizations and customizable date ranges
AI-Powered Insights: Automated business recommendations, peak performance analysis, market opportunity identification, predictive analytics, and actionable alerts based on traffic patterns
Product Management System: Complete catalog management with categorization, real-time stock tracking, price history, intelligent restock alerts, and profit margin optimization
Competitor Analysis Module: Multi-competitor tracking with price comparison charts, historical pricing trends (6+ months), market position analysis, and AI strategic recommendations
Traffic Analytics: Comprehensive visitor metrics, 24-hour traffic patterns, device breakdown (Desktop/Mobile/Tablet), top performing pages, and user behavior insights
Reports & Export Center: Professional PDF/Excel reports for competitor analysis, traffic engagement, monthly sales, and product performance with scheduled automated delivery
Settings & Customization: Theme customization (Dark/Light), notification preferences, API configuration, user management, and access control
Beautiful Modern Interface: Glassmorphism design, smooth animations, intuitive navigation, mobile-responsive layout, and accessibility compliant
tools: Dashboard Overview: Command center with real-time metrics, daily traffic charts, monthly sales bar charts, and AI-powered business insights
Product Catalog Manager: Add/edit/delete products, stock tracking, price management, category organization, and bulk operations support
Competitor Intelligence: Price monitoring across unlimited competitors, visual comparison charts, growth trend indicators, and competitive advantage identification
Analytics Suite: Hourly traffic analysis, device-specific performance metrics, page engagement tracking, and conversion funnel optimization
Report Generator: Automated report creation with customizable templates, scheduled delivery, and multiple export formats (PDF/Excel)
Admin Settings: User profile management, integration configuration, security settings, and team member administration

achievements: 3-8% Revenue Increase Potential through Pricing Optimization

title: Medusa Membership Portal
description: A lightweight, analytics-first membership and team-management platform built on Next.js. Designed for organizations, clubs, and communities that need clear member insights, team management, and integrated payments with beautiful dashboards and actionable data.

longDescription.intro: Medusa Membership is a lightweight membership and team-management platform built on a fast Next.js frontend with analytics-first dashboards. Designed for organizations, clubs, and communities, it provides clear member insights, team management, and payments integration. With pre-built analytics components, robust filtering, and API-first architecture, it's the single place to manage teams, members, and payments while visualizing growth and revenue trends.
features: Team & Member Management: Performant list view with detail drawer for quick member/team previews, fast lookups, clear team composition, and quick edits without leaving the page

Dashboards & Analytics: Pre-built components for monthly registrations, member distribution by category, payment donut charts, timeline area charts, horizontal bar comparisons, university distribution, and team size distribution
Filters, Search & Segmentation: Robust filtering by team attributes, date ranges, membership status, and dimensions to focus on members that matter and create segments for outreach or reporting
Payments & Revenue Tracking: Payment visualization with donut charts, payment URL utilities, hooks for payment data, reconcile membership payments, spot revenue trends, and export for accounting
Team Detail Drawer & Quick Actions: Lightweight drawer to inspect team details (member list, recent activity, payments) without page reloads for faster workflows and less context switching
API-First Integrations: Public/internal API client utilities for easy integration with CRM, email, accounting services, and headless workflows with automation capabilities
Exporting & Reporting: CSV/Excel exports for selected segments and date ranges for compliance, audit, and accounting purposes
Responsive, Accessible UI: Built with Next.js and Tailwind with responsive layouts across all devices and accessible components for inclusive UX
Roles, Permissions & Security: Role-based access for admins, managers, and read-only users with secure multi-user organization support
Onboarding & Support: Guided onboarding flows, sample data mode, in-app help, and support contact to reduce time-to-value for new customers
tools: Member Dashboard: Visual insights for membership growth, team distribution, payment breakdowns, monthly trends, and KPI tracking
Team Manager: List view with filters, search, quick actions, team detail drawer, and member composition analysis
Analytics Suite: Monthly registrations chart, category distribution, payment donut, timeline area, horizontal bar comparisons, and custom date ranges
Payment Integration: Stripe/payment processor connection, revenue tracking, payment reconciliation, and export capabilities
Filter Engine: Advanced filtering by team attributes, date ranges, status, and custom dimensions with saved filter sets
API Client: REST endpoints for teams, members, payments, webhooks, and integrations with external systems

achievements: Single Source for Teams, Members & Payments
Fast Visual Insights with Pre-Built Charts
